start: I BROUGHT MY COPY OF MEMOIRS OF A TWO DOLLAR STREET WALKER! IS THIS THE SHADY OAKS BOOK CLUB? MARTHA!?
WHAT IS THIS CONTRAPTION?! WHERE IS THE BOOK CLUB?
OH, I KNEW I SHOULDN’T TRUST THOSE GOOGLY MAPS!
How does it feel to be nearly finished paying off that pesky debt?
I’d feel a lot better if this new CEO closed the bank.
Keep up the good work and your wish could be granted.
end: If I didn't know any better, I'd say you're having fun with this.
